tokenByUserTip: The Anyswap smart contracts are designed to support any ERC20 token on Fusion. Any token can be loaded into the interface by entering its Fusion address into the search field or passing it as a URL parameter. Be careful when interacting with imported tokens as they have not been verified.

anyBscStakingTip21: BSC cross-chain liquidity farming rewards Christmas CYC Token, no private sale, no pre-mining, and no team share. Total  supply 2,286,000, liquid mining share 80%  and trading mining share 20%. Each BSC block rewards 10 CYC, and the reward halved every 48 hours, end in two weeks.
anyBscStakingTip22: Rebase rules: anchor the price of CNY and rebase once an hour. Trading mining rules: every 24 hours will release according to anyUSDT/BNB trading volume share.
anyBscStakingTip31: 1. Deposit BTC, ETH, USDT tokens via cross-chain bridge https://bsc.anyswap.exchange/bridge,
anyBscStakingTip33: 3. Stake liquidity tokens to farming pool,
anyBscStakingTip34: 4. Withdraw the farming rewards CYC token,
anyBscStakingTip41: This activity aims to verify the cross-chain stablecoin algorithm, the contract code has not been audited, please evaluate the risk yourself.
